sessions.name: Intro to Variables
sessions.content: In Python, variables are used to store data values...
tasks: Define a variable x with the value 10.
Create a variable y with the value 'world'.

sessions.name: Basic Functions
sessions.content: Functions in Python allow you to encapsulate code and reuse it...
tasks: Create a function named 'greet' that returns 'Hello'.
Define a function that adds two numbers.
